content: I am a graduate student at the University of Texas at San Antonio (UTSA). I am currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Computer Science. I am a member of Parallel Computing and Data Intelligence (ParInt) lab , where I work on research projects related to Parallel algorithms, Cryptographic algorithms, Machine Learning and Data Intensive Computing. I also work as a Grader for the Computer Science Department at UTSA.
summary: I am a graduate student at the University of Texas at San Antonio (UTSA).
title: Nathan Lechamo
